# List all Repositories for a Source Code Management Provider

**Web Service Endpoint**

List all Git repositories for a specific source code management provider you connected to Xcode Cloud.

## Getting Provider Information

- **List All Source Code Management Providers**: List all source code management providers you connected to Xcode Cloud.
- **Get a Source Code Management Provider**: Get information about a specific source code management provider you connected to Xcode Cloud.
- **GET /v1/scmProviders/{id}/relationships/repositories**
